levels.name: Title
levels.title: Pop Up Adventure!
levels.body: An exciting story told through system popup messages!

levels.name: NewGame
levels.title: New Game or Continue
levels.body: Would you like to start a new game?

levels.name: Help
levels.title: About Pop Up Adventure
levels.body: Popup Adventure is a text adventure game, delivered through the wildly popular modality of popup messages!

levels.name: Start
levels.title: Warning
levels.body: Your computer has encountered an error. Running checks to determine source...

levels.name: Start0
levels.title: Warning
levels.body: Your computer is sad and tired. It feels unappreciated.

levels.name: AppreciateYes
levels.title: Care
levels.body: That's definitely helps it feel better. You should give it some TLC from time to time, y'know? It works hard for you.

levels.name: AppreciateNo
levels.title: Wow
levels.body: Wow. Do you even know how hard it works for you?

levels.name: Credits
levels.title: Credits
levels.body: Made by Reakain, with help from Blink The Things.

levels.name: Credits1
levels.title: Credits
levels.body: Made with Qt! Source code available at https://github.com/reakain/Popup-Adventure.
